title: India Bridge Offered Respite to Migrants, Before Taking Their Lives
description: Cash compensation for victimsâ€™ families will do little to make up for the life, and economic hope, of migrants among the 134 killed in India.
dc:creator: Sameer Yasir and Emily Schmall
media:description: Watching search operations on Tuesday on the Machchhu River in Morbi, India, two days after a bridge there collapsed and plunged hundreds of people into the water.
